thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Willem

author: Willem
title: Willem
text: About two months after buying a product from Banggood I wrote that my order did not arrive. Metal of Banggood answered quickly if I would check with my post office if there was a package for me. If there is no package I could get a refund or Banggood would resent the package. After my answer that this is not the case Metal offered me to resent my order or to refund. In the end we opted for a refund of my payment.
